entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
